mapper.select: SELECT A.DEVICESEQ as deviceSeq, E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVAL as busStopDetailCategoryInterval, E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVALDISTANCE as busStopDetailCategoryIntervalDistance FROM DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON B.DEVICESEQ = A.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INFO C ON B.BUSINFOSEQ = C.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INTERVAL D ON C.BUSINFOSEQ = D.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY E ON D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE A.DEVICEMODEL=#{deviceId};
SELECT DEVICEMODEL AS deviceModel FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICESEQ =#{deviceSeq};

SELECT F.VIRTUALBUSSTOPSEQ as virtualBusStopSeq,F.VIRTUALBUSSTOP as virtualBusStop,F.VIRTUALBUSSTOPLATITUDE AS virtualBusStopLatitude,F.VIRTUALBUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS virtualBusStopLongitude,F.VIRTUALBUSSTOPORDER AS virtualBusStopOrder FROM DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON B.DEVICESEQ = A.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INFO C ON B.BUSINFOSEQ = C.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INTERVAL D ON C.BUSINFOSEQ = D.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY E ON D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ INNER JOIN VIRTUAL_BUSSTOP F ON E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = F.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE A.DEVICEMODEL=#{deviceId} ORDER BY virtualBusStopOrder ASC;
mapper.update: UPDATE LOCATION SET BUSSTOPSEQ=#{busStopSeq} WHERE LOCATIONSEQ=#{locationSeq};
